page.title: 11MERTON HALL FARM, COVENTRY.
page.content: Merton Farm is a family farm.The owner has lived there since birth. Since then he has gained 40 cattle, there is one cow to the acre.They also have a bit of labour. In 1984 he decided to move up to one hundred cows. He brought a new tank to hold the extra milk. Together with the new equipment this cost him seventeen and a half thousand pounds. But now the milk marketing board says he cannot have more than 75 cows. The farmer milks twice a day and each cow gives{30 litres a day.}They are milked by machine, 12 at a time. He has a{computer}to help feed the cows. It gives a print out at the end of the day to say what each cow has eaten.
